attributes.action: withdraw from the EU as it is costing us 1.3 million pounds a day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the British people demand the Government withdraws from the EU and gets our nationality back. the EU costs the british tax payer £1.3 million a day and we cannot afford this, this has resulted in hardship for Hostpitials, Schools and OAP`s. please send this to every one you know.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
